Room.Name: Goldenrod Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: Goldenrod Avenue continues to the east and west.
Room.LongDescription: The north wall is covered with grafitti, some of it several hundred years old. There are many names scrawled on the wall that any long-time resident of the Land of Mordor would recognize: Pyro, Conan, Princess, Ogre, Fin, Omnipotent, Niemand, Eastman, Ironwolf, Arcana, Shadowhawk, and many more.
